name: The DreaMTree Experience: a psychedelic experience simulation
name_original: The DreaMTree Experience: a psychedelic experience simulation
description:
*flashing lights warning*

something for those interested in the realm of psychedelia...

just trying to create an audiovisual simulation of a psychedelic experience.

probably takes between 5-10 minutes to play through

a work in progress and right now probably a bit heavy on processing from overuse of emissive gifs LOL. But i only really smashed this together over a weekend for myself but decided to share it.

let me know what u think.
